1.title: 9 Months to Live

episode of.title: Scott Baio Is 45... And Single (TV Series 2007– )

1.plot: Having just learned that his longtime girlfriend, Renee, was pregnant, Scott runs away from his graduation party and calls his entourage of Steve Cuccio, Jason Hervey, and Johnny V, for a late night meeting at the golf course.

2.title: Pressure Cooker

episode of.title: Scott Baio Is 45... And Single (TV Series 2007– )

2.plot: Scott and Renee begin the process of moving into their massive new house. When Renee starts barking orders at Scott, he begins to feel some apprehension about the whole sha-bang; living with Renee, having a daughter, losing his freedoms. Later, when he refuses to disclose his anxieties with the Daddy's-To-Be-Class, Scott is encouraged to find someone to share his feelings with, before they overwhelm him. The next day, Scott & Renee join Johnny V on a blind date. When the night turns into a complete disaster because of Johnny V's antics, Scott briefly feels better ...

3.title: Brooklyn

episode of.title: Scott Baio Is 45... And Single (TV Series 2007– )

3.plot: While attending his Daddies-To-Be class, Scott is encouraged to revisit his hometown of Brooklyn, in hopes of determining if he wants to raise his daughter in the same manner that his parents raised him. Although Renee is too pregnant to take the flight with him, she gives Scott her blessing to go alone. Scott jumps on a plane and heads off to New York. After revisiting the home that he grew up in, Scott reunites with old friends, neighbors, and schoolteachers. Each offers Scott different parenting advice, as well as different recollections of his childhood. Even ...

4.title: Man Shower

episode of.title: Scott Baio Is 45... And Single (TV Series 2007– )

4.plot: Scott attends his weekly Daddy's-to-be class, where he learns that raising a child is way more expensive than he had expected. This news couldn t have come at a worse time, as Scott is currently negotiating prices with his wedding planner and reluctantly being dragged off to his "Man Shower" in the most expensive city in the world - Las Vegas. Later, while Renee entertains guests at her well-mannered baby shower back in LA, Scott and the gang, plus a few other old friends, arrive in sin city, with hopes of reliving the glory days. Unfortunately, with Johnny V planning...

5.title: Baby Baio Arrives

episode of.title: Scott Baio Is 45... And Single (TV Series 2007– )

5.plot: As Renee's delivery date approaches, Scott's anxieties about becoming a father go from bad to worse. Feeling completely unprepared to become a parent, he quits his Daddies to be class, and calls an emergency meeting with his old life coach, Doc Ali. She tells Scott that he's missing out on all the best parts of becoming a dad, and must "Get on the Ride" -- or risk letting these life changing moments pass him by. Along the way, Scott also has to console a depressed Johnny V, reconnect with his soon to be step-daughter, and attend a new age birthing class that sends him...

6.title: Manny vs. Nanny

episode of.title: Scott Baio Is 45... And Single (TV Series 2007– )

6.plot: Baby Bailey has finally arrived, and Scott couldn't be any happier-or anymore unprepared, for that matter. Because of this, Renee hires an English baby nurse, to help around the house while she is recovering and to teach Scott a thing or two about raising a baby. Upon arrival, the baby nurse, Helen, immediately has a set of rules and regimens for Scott. She informs Scott she will be staying until he can handle things on his own. Scott knows the longer Helen is in the house, the more she will annoy him. So, he decides to show her that not only can he be the most ...

7.title: Go Daddy-O

episode of.title: Scott Baio Is 45... And Single (TV Series 2007– )

7.plot: The routine of caring for a newborn baby, and the incessant wedding planning has really started to take it toll on Scott s mood. Looking for advice, he rejoins the Daddy s-to-Be class. During which, Scott explains that his life has changed, but he isn t sure if he likes the change yet. Heeding Bill s advice to "Lighten Up," Scott and the gang decide to throw a redneck theme party at the local racetrack. They each take a spin around the California Motor Speedway in 750 horse-power cars, but unfortunately, even this fails to break Scott from his gloomy mood. It isn t ...

8.title: The Road to Responsibility

episode of.title: Scott Baio Is 45... And Single (TV Series 2007– )

8.plot: Scott, now back in his Daddies To Be class, decides to embrace fatherhood and become more responsible. After successfully singing Bailey to sleep, he offers to help Renee stuff invitations for the wedding. Within an hour, Scott goes from just helping out, to being in charge of the entire wedding. Looking to stay on his road to responsibility, Scott heads over to his agent's office looking work, and soon he is auditioning for a new animated project. Unfortunately, Scott's chances of getting the role are compromised when Johnny arrives and starts causing a scene. ...

episode of.title: Scott Baio Is 45... And Single (TV Series 2007– )

3.title: Commitment

episode of.title: Scott Baio Is 45... And Single (TV Series 2007– )

3.plot: Scott confesses to Doc Ali that he has had trouble staying faithful in relationships, so she sends him to visit Playboy Playmate Julie McCullough, an ex of Scott's whom he relentlessly cheated on.

4.title: The Perfect Match

episode of.title: Scott Baio Is 45... And Single (TV Series 2007– )

4.plot: Doc Ali confronts Scott about his tendency to only date busty blonde bombshells, then sends him off to a matchmaker service to help him find a woman he would be compatible with, regardless of her looks.

5.title: Child's Play

episode of.title: Scott Baio Is 45... And Single (TV Series 2007– )

5.plot: Scott receives word from his girlfriend, Renee, that her 17-year-old daughter is going to be in town and that she would like Scott to meet her.

6.title: Intimacy

episode of.title: Scott Baio Is 45... And Single (TV Series 2007– )

6.plot: After telling Scott that he has never been able to have emotional intimacy with a woman, Doc Ali orders Scott to break off a long-term friends with benefits relationship with his friend Connie, then sends Scott with his friends to a cuddle party, where Scott learns from spooning with strangers that there is more to intimacy that just sex.

7.title: What About Your Friends?

episode of.title: Scott Baio Is 45... And Single (TV Series 2007– )

7.plot: Doc Ali asks Scott for the opportunity to meet his friends, in order to see how they influence him.

8.title: Decision Time

episode of.title: Scott Baio Is 45... And Single (TV Series 2007– )

8.plot: In the final week of Scott's therapy, Doc Ali asks him whether he is truly ready to make a commitment to his girlfriend, Renee.

imdb.title: Scott Baio Is 45... And Single
plot: The actor hires a "life-changing counselor" to help him figure out why he hasn't been able to commit to a relationship.::ldavis-2
